Summary: Bright light in sky , slowly dimming and then disapeared
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Somerset
There were no other sightings in Somerset on or around June 12th 2011
divs: Sighting DetailsI was unloading some wooden pallets off my truck On the county line of Burnside, Kentucky and Somerset, ky ... The area of town i was in at that time of night was a darker area of town, the sky was very clear, clearer than i had seen in a very long time, What caught my attention was a bright light from my peripheral , i was like i said unloading pallet, so i wasnt really paying any attention to the sky at the moment but out of my peripheral i saw something get really bright in the sky, i looked to the direction it was coming from and saw what looked to me as a star that had gotten bright and i watched it slowy dim to nothing just disapeared. This was very high in the sky, thats why i said it was star like, but why it went bright then dimmed to nothing , i told my wife maybe i witnessed an exploding star or something, but i know what i saw, and that is why i am writing , thought i would share with everyone, maybe someone might know what it was... thanks...
